translation.en: Fresh peppermint bread.

translation.en: [sniffs] Smells like Christmas.

translation.en: -Here you go, kid, have a wreath. -Oh, cool!

translation.en: [Bartholomew] Merry Christmas to you.
translation.zh: -好酷啊 -祝大家圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Have a great day, dear. -You too, hon. See you tonight!
translation.zh: 祝你一切顺利 亲爱的 -你也是 宝贝 我们晚上见 -喂！

translation.en: -[man] Hurry up! -Okay!

translation.en: [narrator] Yes, Who-ville is great, that is known far and wide
translation.zh: 呼呼镇是最棒的 它的名声传遍了世界

translation.en: and three weeks through December, this place hits its stride.
translation.zh: 到了12月的第三周 这里更是美妙似天堂

translation.en: [narrator] Yes, the Whos down in Who-ville liked Christmas a lot.
translation.zh: 生活在呼呼镇的每一个人 都很喜欢圣诞节

translation.en: But the Grinch, in his cave north of Who-ville,
translation.zh: 但有一个例外 就是住在小镇北面山洞里的…

translation.en: did not.
translation.zh: 格林奇先生

translation.en: Hmm? [groans] ♪ Santa Claus is coming to town ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞老人正赶往小镇

translation.en: ♪ Santa Claus is coming to town ♪

translation.en: ♪ Feliz navidad ♪

translation.en: ♪ Yo, it's Christmas, no dissin' Listen all you listeners... ♪

translation.en: ♪ On the first day of Christmas My true love sent to me ♪
translation.zh: 在圣诞节的第一天 我的真爱送我

translation.en: ♪ A partridge in a pear tree ♪
translation.zh: 一只站在梨树上的鹧鸪鸟

translation.en: Max!
translation.zh: 麦克斯

translation.en: [man singing] ♪ You're a mean one ♪

translation.en: ♪ You really are a heel ♪
translation.zh: （卧室）

translation.en: -[Grinch] Max! -[bell rings]
translation.zh: 麦克斯

translation.en: ♪ You're as cuddly as a cactus ♪
translation.zh: 你像仙人掌一样可爱

translation.en: ♪ You're as charming as an eel ♪
translation.zh: 你像大鳗鱼一样迷人

translation.en: ♪ Mr. Grinch ♪
translation.zh: 格林奇先生

translation.en: ♪ You're a bad banana ♪
translation.zh: 你是根烂香蕉

translation.en: ♪ Mr. Grinch ♪
translation.zh: 格林奇先生

translation.en: ♪ With a greasy black peel ♪
translation.zh: 包着油腻的黑皮

translation.en: ♪ You're a vile one ♪
translation.zh: 你是个大恶棍

translation.en: ♪ You got termites in your smile ♪
translation.zh: 你的微笑爬满了白蚁

translation.en: ♪ You have all the tender sweetness ♪ ♪ Of a seasick crocodile ♪

translation.en: ♪ Mr. Grinch ♪
translation.zh: 格林奇先生

translation.en: ♪ You're a foul one ♪
translation.zh: 你真恶心

translation.en: ♪ Friends, you don't have none ♪
translation.zh: 没人和你做朋友

translation.en: ♪ I wouldn't touch you with a 39-and-a-half-foot pole ♪
translation.zh: 隔着12米长的棍子我都不想碰你

translation.en: ♪ You're a monster ♪
translation.zh: 你是个怪物

translation.en: ♪ Your heart's an empty hole ♪
translation.zh: 你的心中有个洞

translation.en: ♪ You got garlic in your soul ♪
translation.zh: -你的灵魂 -你的灵魂 沾满了蒜味 你的灵魂沾满了蒜味

translation.en: ♪ All them smiles, homie I turn 'em to frowns ♪
translation.zh: 他们在微笑 我就让他们皱眉

translation.en: ♪ All them decorations, I tear 'em down ♪
translation.zh: 所有的装饰 我全部都要毁掉

translation.en: ♪ You could ask Max, I don't play around ♪
translation.zh: 你可以要求我友善点 但我不理你 嘿

translation.en: ♪ Who is this mean fellow with his skin All green and his teeth all yellow? ♪
translation.zh: 这个卑鄙家伙是谁 皮肤全是绿色 他的牙齿全是黄的

translation.en: ♪ What you so mad for? ♪
translation.zh: 你为何如此生气？万圣节到了

translation.en: ♪ Halloween come around And we ain't knocking at your door, man? ♪
translation.zh: 你为何如此生气？万圣节到了 我们不会敲你的门

translation.en: ♪ Mr. Grinch, you're a bad banana ♪
translation.zh: 格林奇先生 你是根烂香蕉

translation.en: ♪ You gonna spoil everybody With your bad attitude ♪
translation.zh: （霉菌香料） 你总是一张臭脸 你会让每个人扫兴 （悲惨 非常悲惨）

translation.en: ♪ Mr. Grinch ♪
translation.zh: 格林奇先生

translation.en: ♪ Who is this mean fellow with his skin All green and his teeth all yellow? ♪
translation.zh: 这个卑鄙家伙是谁 皮肤全是绿色 他的牙齿全是黄的

translation.en: ♪ What you so mad for? ♪
translation.zh: 你为何如此生气？万圣节到了

translation.en: ♪ Halloween come around And we ain't knocking at your door? ♪
translation.zh: 你为何如此生气？万圣节到了 我们不会敲你的门

translation.en: I am starving.
translation.zh: 我快要饿死了

translation.en: Max, what is this depressing bean?
translation.zh: 麦克斯 这颗豆是拿来糊弄鬼的吗？

translation.en: -[barks] -No, no, no. That's impossible. We can't be out of food.
translation.zh: 不…不可能 我们怎么可能没吃的

translation.en: Wha...
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: Where's my personal reserve of moose juice? And goose juice?
translation.zh: 我私藏的那瓶麋鹿肉汁去哪了？ 鹅肉汁呢？ 用来应急的呼呼香肉丁呢？

translation.en: My emergency stash of Who Hash?
translation.zh: 鹅肉汁呢？ 用来应急的呼呼香肉丁呢？

translation.en: And my secret slew of frozen Beezle-Nut stew?
translation.zh: 还有我秘制的冰冻甲虫坚果煲呢？

translation.en: I specifically bought enough food to last until January.
translation.zh: 我特意买了那么多食物 准备挺到一月

translation.en: How much emotional eating have I been doing?
translation.zh: 我心情不好时到底吃了多少东西？

translation.en: No, I won't. I will not.
translation.zh: 不 我不干 我才不去

translation.en: I am not going to Who-ville during...
translation.zh: 我才不要参加呼呼镇的圣…

translation.en: Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞节

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: But I'm gonna despise every second of it.
translation.zh: 但我会鄙视在那里度过的每一秒

translation.en: Come on, Max.

translation.en: [narrator] Yes, the Grinch hated Christmas, the whole Christmas season.
translation.zh: 是的 格林奇憎恨圣诞节 和整个圣诞季

translation.en: Now, please don't ask why.
translation.zh: 请你不要问为什么

translation.en: No one quite knows the reason.
translation.zh: 因为没有人知道原因

translation.en: It could be his head -wasn't screwed on just right. -[neck cracks]
translation.zh: 可能仅仅是因为他的脖子没拧对

translation.en: It could be, perhaps, -that his shoes were too tight. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 也可能是因为他的鞋不太合脚

translation.en: But I think the most likely reason of all
translation.zh: 但是我觉得最有可能的原因

translation.en: may have been that his heart was two sizes too small.
translation.zh: 就是格林奇的心脏比别人的小两号

translation.en: [Grinch] Now, remember, Max,
translation.zh: 你要记住 麦克斯

translation.en: this is the time of year when the Whos are at their most deceptive.
translation.zh: 这是一年之中呼呼镇的人 最喜欢自欺欺人的时候

translation.en: You have my full permission
translation.zh: 如果今天有人对我们说了什么好话

translation.en: to attack anyone who so much as says one kind word to us.
translation.zh: 如果今天有人对我们说了什么好话 你可以放心大胆地去咬他

translation.en: Okay, let's go.
translation.zh: （公共汽车） 来了 我们走

translation.en: -Wait, stop. Oh! -Whoa!

translation.en: -Coming through. -Hey!
translation.zh: -借过 -喂！

translation.en: Wait! Wait! Sam! Hold the bus!

translation.en: Whoo! [sighs] -Sorry, Donna. -That's okay, Sam.
translation.zh: -抱歉 唐娜 -没关系 山姆

translation.en: Thanks for stopping.
translation.zh: 太谢谢你了

translation.en: They've still got you on the night shift, huh?
translation.zh: 他们还让你上夜班吗？

translation.en: Sure do.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Oh, by the way, Cindy-Lou forgot her hockey stick.
translation.zh: 对了 辛迪露忘了拿她的曲棍球棒

translation.en: [singing softly] ♪ Jingle bells Christmas smells ♪
translation.zh: 铃儿响叮当 圣诞的味道

translation.en: Thanks, mister.
translation.zh: 谢谢 先生

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: You're a mean one, mister.
translation.zh: 臭先生 你坏坏

translation.en: It's really such an awful day.
translation.zh: 这真是糟糕的一天

translation.en: -Hey! Merry Christmas. -[gasps]

translation.en: Happy holidays, Sue.

translation.en: -[Sue] Morning, Fred. -[groans]

translation.en: Season's greetings, folks.

translation.en: -And merry Christmas to you! -Ooh!

translation.en: ♪ Let nothing you dismay ♪

translation.en: ♪ To save us all from Satan's power When we were gone astray ♪

translation.en: ♪ Oh, tidings of comfort and joy Comfort and joy ♪
translation.zh: 哦 天赐福音 带来舒适与喜悦

translation.en: ♪ Oh, tidings of comfort and joy ♪
translation.zh: 哦 舒适与喜悦

translation.en: ♪ God rest ye merry gentlemen ♪
translation.zh: 上帝赐予你们快乐 先生们

translation.en: ♪ Let nothing you dismay ♪
translation.zh: 无事令你忧愁

translation.en: ♪ Remember Christ our Savior ♪
translation.zh: 记住耶稣 我们的救主

translation.en: ♪ Was born on Christmas Day ♪
translation.zh: 诞生于圣诞节

translation.en: ♪ Oh, tidings of comfort and joy Comfort and joy ♪

translation.en: ♪ Oh, tidings of comfort and joy ♪
translation.zh: 哦 舒适与喜悦

translation.en: -Oh, hello! Happy-- -Uh-uh!
translation.zh: 你好 节日快…

translation.en: Huh. What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Excuse me? Are you getting that?
translation.zh: 不好意思 您想买这个吗？

translation.en: I need it for my Christmas stuffing. [gasps]
translation.zh: 我需要它在圣诞节做馅用

translation.en: Mmm... No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Well, that's not very nice.
translation.zh: 您这也太不友好了

translation.en: Oh, sugarplum!
translation.zh: 我的糖梅啊

translation.en: Ugh. No, I can't today. I have a list of errands a mile long
translation.zh: 今天去不了 我要干的事情太多了

translation.en: and the babysitter left the sink backed up.
translation.zh: 而且水槽堵了 保姆也没有管

translation.en: No, I'm not complaining. I'm venting. There's a difference.
translation.zh: 不 我不是在抱怨 我在发泄 这可不一样

translation.en: Okay. Talk to you later. I have to get breakfast on the table.
translation.zh: 好 下次再聊 我得把早餐端上桌了

translation.en: Right after I unclog this drain again!
translation.zh: 等我把该死的下水道通好了就端

translation.en: Ugh! It's like concrete.
translation.zh: 好像是水泥做的

translation.en: Cindy-Lou. Sweetheart, come eat.
translation.zh: -辛迪露 亲爱的 快来吃饭 -来了

translation.en: Buster, we've talked about this. Your brother's head is not breakfast.
translation.zh: 巴斯特 我们说好了 你弟弟的头不是早餐

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You all right, Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你还好吗？

translation.en: Me? Oh, yes. Never better. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我吗？很好 不能再好了

translation.en: What'd you put down here, anyway? A roller skate?
translation.zh: 你究竟往这里放了什么？ 滑冰鞋吗？

translation.en: No. Just batter. Me and Ms. Wilbur made cookies.
translation.zh: 不 面糊而已 我和威伯小姐做了饼干

translation.en: Oh, that explains it. Come have some eggs.
translation.zh: 怪不得呢 来吃点鸡蛋

translation.en: I can't, I gotta go mail something.
translation.zh: 不了 我要出去寄点东西

translation.en: But I made the beds and put away the twins' toys.
translation.zh: 但我铺了床 还收好了他们的玩具

translation.en: Thanks, sweetheart. You didn't have to do that.
translation.zh: 谢谢 亲爱的 你不用干这些的

translation.en: I don't mind. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 我不介意

translation.en: -Something's burning. -Just a second, sweetie.
translation.zh: 有东西糊了 等我一下 亲爱的

translation.en: Bean, don't feed your brother with your feet.
translation.zh: 豆豆 别把脚伸到你哥哥嘴里

translation.en: Mom! The toast!
translation.zh: -妈妈 面包片 -交给我

translation.en: Wait, where are you going again?
translation.zh: 等等 你要去哪来着？

translation.en: I told you, to mail a letter.
translation.zh: 我刚说过 去寄信

translation.en: Okay, but just come here first.
translation.zh: 好吧 你得先过来一下

translation.en: Mom, I gotta go.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我得走了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay. Now you can go.
translation.zh: 好啦 可以走了

translation.en: Thanks, Mom. Bye, Buster. Bye, Bean.
translation.zh: 谢谢妈妈 拜拜 巴斯特、豆豆

translation.en: Don't do anything I wouldn't do!
translation.zh: 千万别在外面淘气啊

translation.en: Roger that, Mom!
translation.zh: 好 我知道了 妈妈

translation.en: And here goes Cindy-Lou Who, as she dashes through the snow
translation.zh: 辛迪露呼要去冒险了 她带着一封很重要的信穿过大风雪

translation.en: with a very important letter.
translation.zh: 她带着一封很重要的信穿过大风雪

translation.en: Oh, no! I'm gonna miss the mailman!
translation.zh: 不好 我要错过邮递员了

translation.en: Short cut! [grunts]
translation.zh: 抄近道

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快点…

translation.en: Bon appétit!
translation.zh: 用餐愉快

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: （致圣诞老人 北极） 不好！

translation.en: Watch out!
translation.zh: 小心啊

translation.en: No! My letter!
translation.zh: 不好 我的信

translation.en: Argh! What is wrong with you? Didn't you see me?
translation.zh: 你怎么回事？ 没看到我吗？ 如果这是雪橇 我就被撞死了

translation.en: I mean, if that was a sled, well, I'd be dead.
translation.zh: 没看到我吗？ 如果这是雪橇 我就被撞死了

translation.en: I'm sorry for bumping into you, but this is really important.
translation.zh: 很抱歉撞到您了 但我真的有急事

translation.en: -Have you seen my letter? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 您看到我的信了吗？

translation.en: And that right there, Max, is the true nature of the Who child.
translation.zh: 麦克斯 你看 这就是呼呼镇小孩的真面貌

translation.en: Just right to "Me, me, me.
translation.zh: 只会说：“我我我 我的信 我我我”

translation.en: -My letter. Me, me, me." -No! You don't understand.
translation.zh: 只会说：“我我我 我的信 我我我” 不 您不明白 这不只是一封信

translation.en: This isn't just a letter, this is the letter.
translation.zh: 不 您不明白 这不只是一封信 这是一封非常重要的信

translation.en: Oh, really? Let me guess.
translation.zh: 真的吗？ 让我猜猜 小屁孩 12月20日

translation.en: Small child, December 20th,
translation.zh: 让我猜猜 小屁孩 12月20日

translation.en: rabidly searching for a "really important" lost letter.
translation.zh: 在疯狂地找一封非常重要的信

translation.en: Might it be your list of demands to Santa?
translation.zh: 是你给圣诞老人列的需求清单吗？

translation.en: They're not demands. It's more like a wish.
translation.zh: 不是需求 更像是愿望

translation.en: And what I'm wishing for is really, really important.
translation.zh: 那个愿望对我来说真的非常重要

translation.en: Well, then, why send a letter?
translation.zh: 那为什么要寄信？

translation.en: I mean, if it's really that important, you should just ask him face-to-face.
translation.zh: 如果真的那么重要 你应该当面求他

translation.en: Oh, but that's right. No one's ever seen him.
translation.zh: 可是也对 都没有人真正见过他

translation.en: Mmm, my bad.
translation.zh: 我的错

translation.en: Come on, Max, let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 走 麦克斯 我们回家

translation.en: Bye, doggy.
translation.zh: 再见 狗狗

translation.en: [Bricklebaum singing] ♪ Have a holly, jolly Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 过一个开心快乐的圣诞节

translation.en: ♪ It's the best time of the year ♪
translation.zh: 这是一年中最好的时光

translation.en: There he is, Max.
translation.zh: 他来了 麦克斯

translation.en: The happiest Who alive.
translation.zh: 那个快乐的呼呼人

translation.en: The unbearable Bricklebaum.
translation.zh: 那个让人难以忍受的棒叔叔

translation.en: [chuckles] He thinks we're friends.
translation.zh: 他还以为我们是朋友

translation.en: Quick, let's make a run for it.
translation.zh: 快点 我们赶快溜

translation.en: ♪ I don't know if there'll be snow ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道是否会下雪

translation.en: What... What was that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: ♪ But have a cup of cheer ♪
translation.zh: 但可以喝一杯

translation.en: ♪ Say hello to friends you know ♪
translation.zh: 跟你认识的朋友

translation.en: ♪ And everyone you meet ♪
translation.zh: 和遇到的所有人问声好

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs Of holly... ♪
translation.zh: 用冬青枝装饰大厅…

translation.en: Oh, my goodness, Mr. Grinch! I'm coming.
translation.zh: 天啊 格林奇先生 我来了

translation.en: Leave Mr. Grinch alone.
translation.zh: 快放过格林奇先生

translation.en: That's one tough balloon that you're fighting there,
translation.zh: 那是个难缠的气球

translation.en: you old feisty frosty. Here, come on. Let me help you up.
translation.zh: 你这个冷酷好胜的老家伙 来 我扶你起来

translation.en: I do not want, or need, your help.
translation.zh: 我不想 也不需要你的帮助

translation.en: Oh. "Hair dye. Gorgeous Green Goddess." [chuckles]
translation.zh: “染发剂 美艳的绿色女神”

translation.en: Oh. How did that get in there?
translation.zh: 它是怎么混进去的？

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry if I made you uncomfy.
translation.zh: 我不是故意要让你尴尬的

translation.en: We all gotta keep the gray away. [laughs]
translation.zh: 白头发什么的最讨厌了

translation.en: -I myself use Chocolate Explosion. -You know what?
translation.zh: 我自己用的染发剂就是巧克力爆炸色 知道吗？如果你非要为什么事而道歉

translation.en: If you want to apologize for something, apologize for that!
translation.zh: 知道吗？如果你非要为什么事而道歉 就为那个道歉吧

translation.en: My eyes are burning.
translation.zh: 真是辣眼睛 （圣诞快乐）

translation.en: Don't blame me. Haven't you heard?
translation.zh: 这可不能怪我 你听说了吗？

translation.en: The mayor wants Christmas to be three times bigger this year.
translation.zh: 市长今年想把圣诞庆祝规模扩大三倍

translation.en: That means three times the lights, three times the eggnog, three times the...
translation.zh: 这就意味着三倍的彩灯 三倍的蛋酒 三倍的…

translation.en: -Information needed. -Ha-ha! That's a good one.
translation.zh: -还是拿来我自己看吧 -好主意 （圣诞庆祝规模扩大3倍）

translation.en: Oh, I get it. This is one of your kidding things.
translation.zh: 我懂了 你是在跟我开玩笑

translation.en: Finally, something you said is actually funny. [laughing]
translation.zh: 说真的 你说的这件事实在太有趣了

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, I do kid a lot,
translation.zh: 对 我喜欢开玩笑 但你错了

translation.en: -but, no, this is actually-- -Christmas three times bigger!
translation.zh: -这是真的… -三倍大的圣诞

translation.en: Well, you're just gonna have a good time with this, aren't you?
translation.zh: 好吧 看到这个消息你很开心吧？

translation.en: I gotta say, it's really nice to see you laughing.
translation.zh: 老实说 我都很少看到你大笑

translation.en: Sorry, I can't hear you.
translation.zh: 对不起 我没听见你说什么

translation.en: I don't speak ridiculous.
translation.zh: 我没有开玩笑 别嚷嚷了

translation.en: Oh, you're a scream! Have a nice life. Goodbye.
translation.zh: 我没有开玩笑 别嚷嚷了 -祝你生活愉快 拜拜 -我们回头见

translation.en: Whoo! Oh, man. Mr. Grinch. Oh.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个格林奇先生

translation.en: [narrator] From the edge of his ledge way up in the sky
translation.zh: 站在这座高耸入云的山上

translation.en: the Grinch felt upset, though he wasn't sure why.
translation.zh: 格林奇内心非常沮丧 可是他不清楚为什么

translation.en: It could've been Christmas, all that joy and the such
translation.zh: 可能是因为圣诞节 或所有快乐的事情

translation.en: or some thoughts from his past that he just couldn't quite touch.
translation.zh: 也可能是因为他的过去 和无法触及的回忆

translation.en: But whatever it was, it made his heart moan.
translation.zh: 但无论是什么 都让他由衷哀叹

translation.en: Though he was used to it now, this being alone.
translation.zh: 虽然他已经习惯了这样孑然一身

translation.en: And now safe in his cave, and apart from the fray,
translation.zh: 安然地躲在洞中 远离一切尘嚣

translation.en: -he reminded himself... -[sighs]
translation.zh: 他提醒着自己

translation.en: It is better this way.
translation.zh: 这样是最好的安排

translation.en: That's right, yeah. Just right there.
translation.zh: 没错 是的 就在那里 不…不是你哥哥

translation.en: -No. No. -[footsteps thudding]
translation.zh: 就在那里 不…不是你哥哥

translation.en: -Cindy-Lou! -Don't worry, Mom!
translation.zh: 辛迪露 别担心 妈妈

translation.en: I'm wearing four ski jackets.
translation.zh: 我穿了四件滑雪夹克

translation.en: Four jackets? Aren't you a little hot?
translation.zh: 四件夹克 你难道不热吗？

translation.en: [grunts] Yep. Sweating a little bit.
translation.zh: 对 是有点出汗

translation.en: -Are you going somewhere? -North Pole.
translation.zh: 你这是打算去哪？ -北极 -哇

translation.en: Oh, wow! Any, uh, particular reason?
translation.zh: -北极 -哇 有什么特殊原因吗？

translation.en: -I gotta talk to Santa. -Santa, huh?
translation.zh: -我得跟圣诞老人谈谈 -圣诞老人？

translation.en: Yeah. It's really important.
translation.zh: 对 这件事非常重要

translation.en: Well, it must be if you need to go see him in person.
translation.zh: 好吧 要你亲自去的事肯定很重要

translation.en: -It sure is. -Okay, then. Well, good luck
translation.zh: -当然了 -那好吧 祝你好运

translation.en: and I guess I'll see you in about a month.
translation.zh: 我们估计要一个月以后再见了

translation.en: Wait. It takes a whole month to get to the North Pole?
translation.zh: 等等 去北极需要一个月吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. At least.
translation.zh: 对啊 至少一个月

translation.en: Christmas will be over by the time I got there.
translation.zh: 等我到了那里 圣诞节早就结束了啊

translation.en: Ah, that's true. Now, we would miss you at Christmas.
translation.zh: 是呢 我会在圣诞时想你的

translation.en: Wow, I guess I'm gonna have to come up with another plan.
translation.zh: 这么说来 我必须另外想一个计划了

translation.en: Hey, maybe while you're thinking, you could put the halo on the angel.
translation.zh: 你可以边想边帮我把光环 挂到天使身上

translation.en: -Okay. -[children giggling]
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: You wanna take your jackets off?
translation.zh: 你想脱掉外套吗？

translation.en: Yeah, at least one or two of them.
translation.zh: 没错 至少得脱两件

translation.en: [Donna] No, boys. Don't pull the angel's wings off.
translation.zh: 不行 孩子们 别再拉天使的翅膀了

translation.en: She needs those.
translation.zh: 她不能没有翅膀

translation.en: [playing over radio] ♪ Five gold rings ♪
translation.zh: 五枚金戒指…

translation.en: So, uh... What do you wanna do today?
translation.zh: 那么 你今天想干什么？

translation.en: No idea, huh?
translation.zh: 你没想法吗？

translation.en: Ooh, I got one.
translation.zh: 我有一个

translation.en: All right, all right. I'm sorry. You're a good dog.
translation.zh: 好吧…我很抱歉 你是好狗狗

translation.en: But a bad drummer.
translation.zh: 但不是好鼓手

translation.en: What would you like to do?
translation.zh: 那你想干什么？

translation.en: More than embarrassing to be beaten by a dog.
translation.zh: 要是输给一条狗 我的老脸就没处搁了

translation.en: -Oh, what's that? -[barks]
translation.zh: 什么声音？

translation.en: And checkmate! Again.
translation.zh: 好了 将军 再来

translation.en: What in the world is happening?
translation.zh: 这到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么东西？

translation.en: It's the most beautiful Christmas tree you've ever seen. [laughs]
translation.zh: 这是你见过的世界上最美丽的圣诞树

translation.en: Three times bigger? That's a hundred times bigger!
translation.zh: 大三倍？这明明就是大一百倍！

translation.en: Oh, you just wait till we light it tonight.
translation.zh: 我们今天晚上就会把它点亮

translation.en: It'll sparkle so bright, you'll be celebrating Christmas with the rest of us. Ho-ho!
translation.zh: 一定非常璀璨 你也跟我们一起庆祝圣诞节吧

translation.en: [Bricklebaum] Oh, man! I can't wait. I'm gonna keep at it.
translation.zh: 天啊 我都等不及了 我得干活了

translation.en: -I'll see you later, Grinchy! -No!
translation.zh: 我们待会见 格林奇 不待会你才不会见到我

translation.en: You will not see me later, and I will not be celebrating.
translation.zh: 不待会你才不会见到我 我是不会去庆祝的

translation.en: And that tree, that tree
translation.zh: 而那棵树…那棵…树

translation.en: has got to go.
translation.zh: 绝对不能留着

translation.en: Come on, Mom. Cindy-Lou, look over there.
translation.zh: -快点 妈妈 -辛迪露 看那边

translation.en: -Wow! That's amazing! -Thank you!
translation.zh: -真的好帅啊 -谢谢你

translation.en: Ooh, a three-eyed sock monster!
translation.zh: 还有三只眼的袜子怪

translation.en: Awesome robot!
translation.zh: 好棒的机器人

translation.en: [Mayor McGerkle] Oh, how marvelous this time of year is.
translation.zh: 我们又迎来了一年之中最美妙的时刻

translation.en: Welcome, Who-ville, to the annual tree-lighting ceremony.
translation.zh: 欢迎呼呼镇的居民们 参加一年一度的圣诞树点灯仪式

translation.en: How spectacular are these ornaments?
translation.zh: 快看 我们制作的装饰多么壮观啊

translation.en: Look what I made, everybody. It's a Christmas dragon.
translation.zh: 大家看看我做了什么 这是一条圣诞龙

translation.en: It came to me in a dream. [chuckles] Oh, man!
translation.zh: 我是从梦中得到的灵感 天啊

translation.en: -Hey, Bartholomew! -Hey there, Ms. Who.
translation.zh: -巴塞洛缪 -呼女士

translation.en: -Here you go! -Got it!
translation.zh: -交给你了 -没问题

translation.en: Find a good spot for it.
translation.zh: 帮它找个好位置

translation.en: There it goes.
translation.zh: 飞起来了

translation.en: [Mayor McGerkle] Now, let's get ready to flip that switch and light up the sky.
translation.zh: 今晚 我们将在这里按下开关 点亮夜空

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, no! Not on my watch, you don't.
translation.zh: 不会的 我还没答应让你们按

translation.en: See you guys soon! I'm gonna go find Groopert.
translation.zh: 待会见 我要去找咕噜波

translation.en: Okay. Have fun. Bye. Say bye.
translation.zh: 好 去玩吧 跟姐姐再见

translation.en: Here you go. I hope your big brother gets what he deserves.
translation.zh: （雪球） -拿好了 -我希望你哥得到应有的惩罚

translation.en: Hey, Groopert, how's business?
translation.zh: 咕噜波 生意怎么样？

translation.en: Good. What I can't sell I can always eat.
translation.zh: 很好 就算卖不掉 也可以吃掉 （雪甜筒）

translation.en: I need to talk to you about something really important.
translation.zh: 我要跟你说一件非常重要的事

translation.en: -Okay. -Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: -好 -来吧 我们走

translation.en: All right, check this out, Groopert.
translation.zh: 快点 到上面去 咕噜波

translation.en: I'm gonna stay up on Christmas Eve this year and meet Santa Claus.
translation.zh: 今年平安夜我不打算睡觉了 我要等着见圣诞老人

translation.en: Whoa, that is crazy!
translation.zh: 这想法太疯狂了

translation.en: Yeah, I really gotta talk to him.
translation.zh: 是啊 我必须跟他当面谈谈

translation.en: About what?
translation.zh: 谈什么？

translation.en: Well, it's really personal.
translation.zh: 特别私人的事情

translation.en: But I'm going to tell you because you're my best friend.
translation.zh: 但我会告诉你 因为你是我最好的朋友

translation.en: It's about my mom.
translation.zh: 是我妈妈的事

translation.en: She works all night and takes care of us all day.
translation.zh: 她要整夜工作 白天还要照顾我们

translation.en: And it just isn't fair.
translation.zh: 这太不公平了

translation.en: She acts like she's fine,
translation.zh: 她表面看上去还好

translation.en: but I know it's really hard for her.
translation.zh: 但我知道 她已经很累了

translation.en: So I figured if anyone could fix that, it'd be Santa.
translation.zh: 所以我想大概只有圣诞老人 能解决这个问题

translation.en: Wow. And I just asked him for a turtle.
translation.zh: 哇 我只向他要了一只乌龟

translation.en: [Mayor McGerkle] Here we go!
translation.zh: -大家注意 -开始了

translation.en: Oh, it's starting.
translation.zh: -大家注意 -开始了 好了 朋友们

translation.en: Okay, Who-ville, it is time to light this beautiful tree.
translation.zh: 是时候点亮这棵举世无双的圣诞树了

translation.en: ...17, 18, 19 and 20. [chuckling]
Okay, lock and load.
translation.zh: 好了 装弹瞄准

translation.en: All right, just attach this here
translation.zh: 好的 把这个卡在这里

translation.en: and we'll be ready to launch. [grunts]
translation.zh: 我们就可以发射了

translation.en: I know! I wish I could see the look on their faces.
translation.zh: 我知道 要是能看到 他们脸上的表情就好了

translation.en: [shouting] Whoa!
translation.zh: 天啊…

translation.en: Okay. Oh, boy!
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: That could be so much worse.
translation.zh: 真是太惊险了

translation.en: Let's begin the countdown.
translation.zh: 让我们开始倒计时

translation.en: [all] Ten, nine,
translation.zh: 十、九

translation.en: eight, seven,
translation.zh: 八、七

translation.en: six, five,
translation.zh: 六 五、四

translation.en: four, three, two...
translation.zh: 五、四 三、二

translation.en: Hey! My dragon can fly!
translation.zh: 嘿 我的龙居然会飞

translation.en: ...one!
translation.zh: -一 -不要…

translation.en: Oh, my!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: No, no, no! No, no!
translation.zh: 不要…

translation.en: -Whoa! -Wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: Oh, it's beautiful.
translation.zh: 真是太美了

translation.en: There it is, the most beautiful tree Who-ville has ever seen.
translation.zh: 你们看 这真是我们呼呼镇有史以来 最美丽的圣诞树

translation.en: [panting] No! No!
translation.zh: 不要… 祝大家佳节愉快

translation.en: [groans] No! No, no.
translation.zh: 不要…

translation.en: [narrator] He walked through the crowd and the sound, and the lights.
translation.zh: 他穿过人群、喧嚣和灯火

translation.en: And his ears heard the thump of their joy and delights.
translation.zh: 人们的欢声笑语在他耳畔此起彼伏

translation.en: And it took him right back to his earliest years,
translation.zh: 让他忍不住回想起自己的童年时光

translation.en: to that lost, lonely boy who cried all of those tears.
translation.zh: 回想起那个寂寞、孤独 哭干了眼泪的男孩

translation.en: That lost, lonely boy, isolated and sad
translation.zh: 那个失落的男孩内心满是忧伤

translation.en: with no home of his own, no mom and no dad.
translation.zh: 他没有自己的家 没有爸爸和妈妈 （孤儿院）

translation.en: And as the Grinch looked around, he felt downright scared
translation.zh: 当格林奇环顾四周 他感到非常害怕

translation.en: as he remembered that Christmas where nobody cared.
translation.zh: 他记起那个圣诞节 没人关心他

translation.en: Where nobody showed, not even a flea,
translation.zh: 没人来看他 大厅一片空旷

translation.en: and there were no cards, no gifts, and no tree.
translation.zh: 那里没有贺卡 没有礼物 没有圣诞树

translation.en: And as he watched other kids,
translation.zh: 他看着其他孩子

translation.en: one thing became clear,
translation.zh: 渐渐明白了一件事

translation.en: that this was the single worst day of the year.
translation.zh: 圣诞节是他在一年中 最不愿度过的一天

translation.en: And now here it was, that day once again
translation.zh: 如今他面对着周围的一切

translation.en: when he felt all those feelings he felt way back when.
translation.zh: 深埋于心的悲伤再次涌现

translation.en: When he'd watch Whos young and old all sit down to feast,
translation.zh: 他看着呼呼镇的男女老幼 全都坐下享受盛宴

translation.en: and they'd feast, and they'd feast, and they'd feast, feast, feast, feast.
translation.zh: 享受盛宴…盛宴…

translation.en: They'd feast on Who-pudding, and rare Who roast beast.
translation.zh: 他们吃着呼呼布丁 还有三分熟的呼呼烤肉

translation.en: Which is something the Grinch could not stand in the least.
translation.zh: 这都是格林奇最最难以忍受的东西

translation.en: And then they'd do something he liked least of all.
translation.zh: 他们还会做他最不喜欢的事情

translation.en: Every Who down in Who-ville, the tall and the small,
translation.zh: 那些不同肤色 不同身高的人们

translation.en: would stand close together with Christmas bells ringing.
translation.zh: 会亲密地站在一起 随着圣诞钟声敲响

translation.en: They'd stand hand-in-hand and the Whos would start singing.
translation.zh: 彼此手拉着手 唱起歌颂圣诞的歌

translation.en: [all singing] ♪ Fahoo fores dahoo dores ♪
translation.zh: 法乎佛里斯 达乎多利丝

translation.en: ♪ Welcome, Christmas Come this way ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎 圣诞节 来这里

translation.en: ♪ Fahoo fores dahoo dores ♪
translation.zh: 法乎佛里斯 达乎多利丝

translation.en: ♪ Welcome, Christmas Christmas Day ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎 圣诞 圣诞节

translation.en: ♪ Welcome, welcome Fahoo ramus ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎…法乎佛里斯

translation.en: ♪ Welcome, welcome... ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎…

translation.en: They'll sing, and they'll sing,
translation.zh: 他们唱啊 他们唱啊 唱啊…

translation.en: and they'll sing, sing, sing, sing.
translation.zh: 他们唱啊 唱啊…

translation.en: [narrator] Yes, he couldn't recall without feeling the sting.
translation.zh: 每当他忆起过去 灵魂都会感到刺痛

translation.en: So the Grinch finally declared...
translation.zh: 所以格林奇立下誓言

translation.en: [whispers] I must stop this whole thing.
translation.zh: 我必须阻止这一切

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: For 53 years I've put up with it.
translation.zh: 53年来我一直在忍受

translation.en: Now...
translation.zh: 现在…

translation.en: I must stop this Christmas from coming,
translation.zh: 我必须想办法阻止圣诞节的来临

translation.en: but how?
translation.zh: 我该怎么做？

translation.en: [narrator] Then he got an idea,
translation.zh: 他想出了一个主意

translation.en: an awful idea.
translation.zh: 一个糟糕的主意

translation.en: The Grinch got a wonderful, awful idea.
translation.zh: 格林奇有了一个绝妙又可怕的想法

translation.en: I know just what to do.
translation.zh: 我终于知道应该怎么办了

translation.en: I'm going to steal their Christmas.
translation.zh: 我要偷走他们的圣诞节

translation.en: All the trimmings. All the trappings.
translation.zh: 所有的装饰、所有的服饰

translation.en: All their gifts and garlands.
translation.zh: 他们所有的礼物和花环

translation.en: When they wake and see it's gone
translation.zh: 他们醒来后看到圣诞节消失了

translation.en: then all their joy and happiness will be gone as well.
translation.zh: 他们的欢乐和幸福也会跟着一起消失

translation.en: So prepare yourself, Max.
translation.zh: 我们要着手准备了 麦克斯

translation.en: For, tomorrow we begin. [echoing]
translation.zh: 明天一早 我们就开始

translation.en: Genius starts with the abs, Max.
translation.zh: 天才始于腹肌 麦克斯

translation.en: It's go time.
translation.zh: 行动时间到

translation.en: And now,
translation.zh: 那么现在…

translation.en: the question we have all been waiting for.
translation.zh: 我们要解决最棘手的问题了

translation.en: How will I steal Christmas?
translation.zh: 我应该如何偷走圣诞节呢？

translation.en: Well, prepare to have your little doggy mind blown. Poof.
translation.zh: 好了 准备好 让你的小狗脑袋瓜震惊起来吧

translation.en: Ta-da! [chuckles] That's right.
translation.zh: （圣诞老人） 没错

translation.en: I become Santa Claus.
translation.zh: 我乔装成圣诞老人

translation.en: But instead of giving all the joy and happiness, I'll take it away.
translation.zh: 但不是给予快乐和幸福 而是夺走它们

translation.en: If he can deliver Christmas to the whole world in one night,
translation.zh: 如果他可以在一夜之间 将圣诞节送到全世界

translation.en: then I can certainly steal it from little old Who-ville.
translation.zh: 那我当然也可以把它 从又小又旧的呼呼镇夺走

translation.en: I mean, come on, what's Santa have that I don't?
translation.zh: 我是说 你瞧 他有的 我不是都有吗？

translation.en: That's hurtful.
translation.zh: 你扎心了

translation.en: Um, what are you doing with my bowling ball?
translation.zh: 你打算对我的保龄球做什么？

translation.en: Chasing it.
translation.zh: 追它啊

translation.en: -And you're taking it where? -It's a secret.
translation.zh: 你要把它带到哪去？ -这是个秘密 -好吧

translation.en: [sighs] All right, but not without breakfast. Catch.
translation.zh: 但是得吃早餐 接住

translation.en: Whoa, waffles, my favorite!
translation.zh: 华夫饼 我的最爱

translation.en: Thanks! See you guys later!
translation.zh: 谢谢 回头见

translation.en: [grunts] Here we go.
translation.zh: 出发吧

translation.en: -Hey, Cindy-Lou! -Oh, hey there, Mr. Cubbins.
translation.zh: -嗨 辛迪露 -你好 库宾斯先生

translation.en: -Ready. -All right. Let's go.
translation.zh: -准备好了 -好的 出发

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 好棒！

translation.en: Let's go, let's go. Let's move.
translation.zh: 快…我们走

translation.en: Hang on! Whoo!
translation.zh: 抓紧了

translation.en: And dismount.
translation.zh: 好了 跳

translation.en: So, what do we know?
translation.zh: 那么 我们知道些什么？

translation.en: Waffles are delicious.
translation.zh: 华夫饼真好吃

translation.en: Super delicious. But I meant about meeting Santa.
translation.zh: 超级好吃 但我是指圣诞老人的事

translation.en: We know no one's ever done it.
translation.zh: 我们知道没人见过他

translation.en: Okay. How about this?
translation.zh: 好吧 你看这样行吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna sit in the living room with my eyes wide open, like this,
translation.zh: 我在客厅里蹲守 就像现在这样睁大眼睛

translation.en: and if I start to drift off,
translation.zh: 如果我开始打瞌睡

translation.en: I'll just open them wider!
translation.zh: 我就努力睁得更大

translation.en: Um, I'm pretty sure you're gonna fall asleep.
translation.zh: 我敢打包票你会睡着的

translation.en: And by the time you wake up... He'll be gone.
translation.zh: -然后等你醒来… -他早就走了

translation.en: [whooshes] Nothing but cookie crumbs.
translation.zh: 只留了一堆饼干屑

translation.en: Yeah, you're right.
translation.zh: 嗯 你说得对

translation.en: -I got it. -Tell me!
translation.zh: -有主意了 -告诉我

translation.en: Maple syrup.
translation.zh: 用枫糖浆

translation.en: All right, maple syrup.
translation.zh: 好吧 枫糖浆

translation.en: We pour it on the roof, the reindeer get stuck
translation.zh: 我们倒在屋顶上 把驯鹿粘住

translation.en: and then they can't fly away.
translation.zh: 然后它们就飞不走了

translation.en: Science!
translation.zh: 这是科学

translation.en: Won't the syrup just freeze?
translation.zh: 糖浆会结冰吧？

translation.en: Good point.
translation.zh: 有道理

translation.en: Also, how do we get all that syrup on the roof?
translation.zh: 而且去哪弄那么多倒在屋顶上？

translation.en: Yeah, I got nothing.
translation.zh: 对 我没办法了

translation.en: Wait a minute. I think I got it.
translation.zh: 等一下 我有主意了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: We're gonna need the whole gang for this one.
translation.zh: 我们必须组建一个团伙

translation.en: Okay. If I'm gonna become Santa, then I need to get into character.
translation.zh: （《克林格圣诞年鉴》） 好 如果我想成为圣诞老人 那从现在起我就要进入角色

translation.en: All right. Let's see. "Christmas tree,
translation.zh: 好吧 我们来看看 “圣诞树”

translation.en: Christmas traditions, Christmas pudding."
translation.zh: “圣诞节传统” “圣诞节布丁”

translation.en: How does pudding work its way into everything?
translation.zh: 布丁怎么跟什么都有关系？

translation.en: Where is the Santa stuff?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人在哪一页？

translation.en: Look at this, little girls and boys giggling over sugarplums.
translation.zh: 快看 小女孩和小男孩 看着糖梅咯咯笑

translation.en: Look how they did the roof of the gingerbread house with vanilla icing.
translation.zh: （姜饼屋） 看看他们如何用香草糖霜 做姜饼屋顶

translation.en: Hmm. Little family of gumdrops.
translation.zh: 橡皮糖做的小房子

translation.en: Huh. So dumb. So, so stupidly dumb.
translation.zh: 太愚蠢了 简直愚蠢至极

translation.en: Ah, here we are!
translation.zh: 找到了

translation.en: "The Legend of Santa Claus.
translation.zh: “圣诞老人的传说”

translation.en: Red suit, white beard. Always in a jolly mood."
translation.zh: 红色外套、白胡子 每天都喜气洋洋

translation.en: Oh. That's not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 那是不可能的

translation.en: Oh, well. Let's just start by finding ourselves some reindeer.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们马上开始 第一步是找几只驯鹿

translation.en: Beautiful, isn't it, Max?
translation.zh: 很好看吧 麦克斯？

translation.en: This, my little friend, is the Rein-Horn.
translation.zh: 这个是我的小道具 一支驯鹿号角

translation.en: It perfectly recreates the mating call of the reindeer.
translation.zh: 它完美地重现驯鹿交配时的叫声

translation.en: Behold.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: Oh. Hey, there. Sorry, little goat. I was calling for a--
translation.zh: 你好 对不起 小山羊 我本来是想叫…

translation.en: What was that? Scram! Skedaddle!
translation.zh: 这是干什么？ 滚开 快滚

translation.en: Strange goat.
translation.zh: 奇怪的山羊

translation.en: Now, reindeer migrate,
translation.zh: 这个时候驯鹿正在迁移

translation.en: so maybe we'll catch a few headed south for the winter.
translation.zh: 也许能抓住去南方过冬的驯鹿

translation.en: I also read that they tend to mate in densely wooded--
translation.zh: 我还听说它们喜欢在小树林里交…

translation.en: -Will you stop following us? -[bleats]
translation.zh: 你能不能别再跟着我们了

translation.en: Shoo! Away! Go back to the goat farm! Go eat a can.
translation.zh: 快走开 回你的农场里去 吃你的罐头去

translation.en: All right, now that that's over,
translation.zh: 好了 那只羊终于走了

translation.en: -back to the task at hand. -[wind whooshing]
translation.zh: 我们继续手头的任务

translation.en: Whoo. It's a little crisp.
translation.zh: 感觉有点凉爽

translation.en: Oh, it's getting really cold.
translation.zh: 怎么变得越来越冷了？

translation.en: Oh, goodness!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Can't feel my lips!
translation.zh: 我的嘴唇都冻得没感觉了

translation.en: Can't blink.
translation.zh: 眼睛也眨不了

translation.en: Eyes frozen!
translation.zh: 眼皮冻住了

translation.en: Max,
translation.zh: 麦克斯…

translation.en: we've hit the mother lode.
translation.zh: 我们找到了一大群驯鹿

translation.en: [gasps] We'll have 100 reindeer to pull our--
translation.zh: 这样我们就可以有100头驯鹿来拉…

translation.en: Well, Santa had eight.
translation.zh: 好吧 圣诞老人有八只驯鹿

translation.en: He looks like he ate the other seven.
translation.zh: 他看着像吃了其他七只

translation.en: Watch and learn, Max.
translation.zh: 好好学着点 麦克斯

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: Frozen, stinking...
translation.zh: 别舔了 真恶心

translation.en: Stop, stop.
translation.zh: 停下…

translation.en: Onward, my furry friends.
translation.zh: 前进 我的毛毛朋友们

translation.en: We're walking toward destiny.
translation.zh: 让我们一起面对命运吧

translation.en: All right, you called, we came.
translation.zh: 你一打电话我们就来了

translation.en: -So what's up? -Yeah, what's the deal?
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -是啊 有什么事？

translation.en: Thanks for getting here so fast, guys. Follow me.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们这么快就赶到 跟我来

translation.en: So what's the big secret?
translation.zh: 那个大秘密是什么？

translation.en: Yeah, I don't have very long. My parents set the timer.
translation.zh: 是啊 我时间不多 我爸妈设了计时器

translation.en: -Dude. -Don't ask. It's new.
translation.zh: -哥们 -别问 新买的

translation.en: All right, everybody, brace yourselves.
translation.zh: 请大家打起精神听我说

translation.en: In exactly 48 hours
translation.zh: 再过整整48个小时

translation.en: we're going to do something that's never been done before.
translation.zh: 我们就要去做一件 历史上从未有人做到过的大事

translation.en: We're gonna trap Santa Claus!
translation.zh: 我们要抓住圣诞老人

translation.en: [Ozzy] Trap Santa? Why would we wanna do that?
translation.zh: 抓住圣诞老人？抓了他有什么用？

translation.en: Duh. To steal all his toys. I love it.
translation.zh: 笨 偷走所有的玩具啊 -我挺你 真是个好主意 -好棒！

translation.en: -That's a great idea. -Not to steal his toys.
translation.zh: -我挺你 真是个好主意 -好棒！ 不是偷他的玩具

translation.en: To, um... To talk to him.
translation.zh: 是要跟他谈谈

translation.en: What? Why'd you wanna talk to him?
translation.zh: 什么？你想跟他谈什么啊？

translation.en: -It's personal. -Yeah, it's kinda personal.
translation.zh: 是私人的事情 -对 是有点私事 -那好…

translation.en: Well, I don't wanna do it if you won't tell me why.
translation.zh: 如果你不告诉我原因 我就不干

translation.en: What are you talking about, "personal"?
translation.zh: -私事是指什么？ -艾克兹

translation.en: Axl, when you asked to borrow $16 and my mom's suitcase,
translation.zh: 当你跟我借16块钱 和我妈妈的行李箱的时候

translation.en: did I ask you why?
translation.zh: 我有问你原因吗？

translation.en: -No. -[Ozzy chuckles]
translation.zh: -没有 -那你呢 欧兹？

translation.en: And what about you, Ozzy? Remember when you got stuck in that--
translation.zh: -没有 -那你呢 欧兹？ -那次你遇到困难… -好 行了 天啊

translation.en: All right, all right, okay. Jeez.
translation.zh: -那次你遇到困难… -好 行了 天啊

translation.en: I did it because you're my friend.
translation.zh: 我把你们都当成朋友

translation.en: And when something matters to you, that means it matters to me.
translation.zh: 当一件事对你们很重要时 就意味着对我很重要

translation.en: That's beautiful.
translation.zh: 听着好感人

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. You convinced me.
translation.zh: 好吧…你说服了我

translation.en: -Count me in, too. -All right, we're in.
translation.zh: -也算我一个 -好吧 我们都加入

translation.en: Great! Now let's do this.
translation.zh: -好 我们这就开工 -好 就这么办

translation.en: -[Axl] Yeah, let's do this! -[Ozzy] Let's make it happen. Awesome.
translation.zh: -好棒！ -大家加油

translation.en: [Axl] Cool. That is so cool.
translation.zh: 我们太酷了

translation.en: [Cindy-Lou] To the bikes.
translation.zh: -去拿车 -好

translation.en: -[Donna] Cindy-Lou, dinner time! -[man] Come here, guys, dinner time!
translation.zh: -辛迪露 开饭了 -大家过来 开饭了

translation.en: -[woman] Time to eat! -Ooh, dinner.
translation.zh: -该吃饭了 -开饭了

translation.en: All right, we meet first thing in the morning.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们明天一早再见面

translation.en: -Okay. -All right.
translation.zh: -好的 -好 明早见

translation.en: -See you tomorrow. -See you guys in the morning.
translation.zh: -明早见 -欧兹 时间到

translation.en: -[woman] Ozzy, timer! -Okay, Mom!
translation.zh: -明早见 -欧兹 时间到 来了 妈妈

translation.en: [whispering] This is the loudest snow I've ever heard in my life.
translation.zh: 这是我这辈子听过最大的踩雪声

translation.en: You two, go around the back.
translation.zh: 你们俩绕到背面去

translation.en: Wait for me to drop the sleigh from the roof. Okay?
translation.zh: 等我把雪橇从屋顶放下来 懂吗？

translation.en: Go, team.
translation.zh: 出发 小队

translation.en: What? What's going on?
translation.zh: 发生什么了？

translation.en: Hey! Who taught Mabel how to use the doorbell?
translation.zh: 是谁教会玛宝按门铃的？

translation.en: Man, that's awesome. You smart little dog.
translation.zh: 太厉害了 你这只聪明的小狗狗

translation.en: [all singing] ♪ Holy infant ♪ Huh? What's this?
translation.zh: -圣洁婴孩 -这是什么？

translation.en: ♪ So tender and mild ♪
translation.zh: 纯真可爱

translation.en: ♪ Sleep in heavenly peace ♪
translation.zh: 尽享天赐安眠

translation.en: ♪ Sleep in heavenly peace ♪
translation.zh: 尽享天赐安眠

translation.en: All right, here it comes.
translation.zh: 好 我要下来了 准备好

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells ♪ Oh! [laughs]
translation.zh: 你说…什么？

translation.en: Oh, look at that. Mabel is delivering cakes now.
translation.zh: 快看啊 玛宝给我送蛋糕了

translation.en: I mean, is this the best Christmas or what?
translation.zh: 我想说 这不就是最好的圣诞节吗？

translation.en: Ooh! Holy moly!
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Man, I don't know what's in this cake, but I think I just saw Santa Claus. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我不知道这蛋糕里有什么 但我好像看到圣诞老人了

translation.en: Let me get another piece.
translation.zh: 我要再吃一块

translation.en: Today was great!
translation.zh: 今天真是太棒了

translation.en: We did mean things and we did them in style.
translation.zh: 我们不光干了坏事 还干得有模有样

translation.en: -[whines] -Max, you know the rules.
translation.zh: 麦克斯 规矩你懂的

translation.en: You sleep in your bed, and I sleep in...
translation.zh: 你睡你的床 我睡我的…

translation.en: Oh, no, no, not you, too. I don't believe this.
translation.zh: 不…你也不行 这是什么情况？

translation.en: Max, did you teach him puppy eyes?
translation.zh: 麦克斯 是你教它狗狗眼的吗？

translation.en: Fine. This one time.
translation.zh: 好吧 下不为例

translation.en: Mmm. Now that is a great cup of coffee!
translation.zh: 这杯咖啡太好喝了

translation.en: Max, this morning, you and I need to do some recon.
translation.zh: 麦克斯 今早我们去做一些事前侦察

translation.en: Fred, you just sit right there.
translation.zh: 弗雷德 你坐在那里别动

translation.en: And don't touch anything!
translation.zh: 什么都不许碰

translation.en: Intel, Max, that's what we're after.
translation.zh: 听好了 麦克斯 我们要查的

translation.en: How many houses are in Who-ville and how many Whos?
translation.zh: 是呼呼镇有多少栋房子和人口

translation.en: How many wreaths and trees and chimney flues?
translation.zh: 有多少个花环 圣诞树和烟囱

translation.en: I'll be in your ear the whole time, and whatever you're seeing
translation.zh: 我会用耳麦跟你通话 你看到的东西

translation.en: [through comms] I'll be seeing on the monitor.
translation.zh: 都会显示在监视器上

translation.en: -Ready? Now off you go, Max. -[whines]
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？出发吧 麦克斯

translation.en: Fly, boy! Fly!
translation.zh: 飞吧 狗狗 飞吧

translation.en: Max, stop socializing!
translation.zh: 麦克斯 不要撩鸟

translation.en: Now, let's go in for a look.
translation.zh: 我们这就过去看看

translation.en: Okay. Six houses on Oak Street... Oh, watch out!
translation.zh: 好 冬青巷有6栋房子 小心！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: [Grinch] Okay. Go, go, go, go!
translation.zh: 好了 过去…

translation.en: Now cut through Main Street and survey the south side.
translation.zh: 现在穿过主街去调查南边

translation.en: Look at those greedy little gift monsters.
translation.zh: 看看那些不要脸的熊孩子

translation.en: Loading themselves up with Christmas junk.
translation.zh: 只会吵着要没用的圣诞礼物

translation.en: Okay, Max, turn right here.
translation.zh: 好 麦克斯 从这里右转

translation.en: So I woke up this morning, got dressed, had my coffee,
translation.zh: 我今早醒来 穿好衣服 喝了咖啡

translation.en: went outside, looked on the roof.
translation.zh: 走到外面 一看屋顶

translation.en: My sleigh was gone.
translation.zh: 我的雪橇不见了

translation.en: My, my, I wonder who took it.
translation.zh: 天啊 我真想知道是谁偷的

translation.en: Okay, let's see here.
translation.zh: （斯摩奇香肠店香肠） 好 我们算算看 如果每小时走28栋房子

translation.en: If we do 28 houses an hour for six hours, that would be sausages.
translation.zh: 好 我们算算看 如果每小时走28栋房子 6个小时后就能吃香肠 香肠？

translation.en: [exclaims] Sausages?
translation.zh: 6个小时后就能吃香肠 香肠？

translation.en: Max! Don't even think about it.
translation.zh: 麦克斯 不许打香肠的主意

translation.en: Max!
translation.zh: 麦克斯！

translation.en: Max, are you okay? Max?
translation.zh: 麦克斯 你没事吧？麦克斯？

translation.en: Oh, hey, look, it's me.
translation.zh: 看 是我自己

translation.en: Oh, dear. [groans]
translation.zh: 惨了

translation.en: [groans] Bad dog.
translation.zh: 坏狗狗

translation.en: Fred! We're home!
translation.zh: 弗雷德 我们回来了

translation.en: Fred!
translation.zh: 弗雷德

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 你开心就好

translation.en: Come on, we got work to do.
translation.zh: 过来 我们还有事要做

translation.en: Now, let's plan our route.
translation.zh: 现在我们计划一下路线

translation.en: First, now, we go south, quick jaunt to the east,
translation.zh: 首先 我们往南走 再快速往东拐

translation.en: and then this house, skip the subdivision for the moment,
translation.zh: 然后到这个房子 暂时跳过岔路

translation.en: knock off the entire southeast quadrant of the town.
translation.zh: 扫荡完镇子的整个东南区域

translation.en: And then we finish it all up
translation.zh: 最后拿下口哨呼呼巷

translation.en: on Whistling Who Lane.
translation.zh: 就大功告成了

translation.en: That's 223 houses and only seven hours of darkness to work with.
translation.zh: 一共223栋房子 只能在夜间七个小时里行动

translation.en: That means we have to be fast and focused.
translation.zh: 这意味着我们必须又快又专心

translation.en: And believe you me, there will be temptation...
translation.zh: 相信我 我们的周围会有…

translation.en: ...all around us.
translation.zh: 很多诱惑

translation.en: Behold! The present! This is our enemy.
translation.zh: 看啊 礼物 这就是我们的敌人

translation.en: You will want to unwrap it and play with it.
translation.zh: 你会想拆开包装 把玩具拿出来玩

translation.en: Hmm. But you must not!
translation.zh: 但是绝对不行

translation.en: And if you can get past the present, the only obstacle left is
translation.zh: 如果你能战胜礼物的诱惑 剩下的唯一障碍就是…

translation.en: the cookie.
translation.zh: 饼干

translation.en: Look at it in all its red, sugary splendor.
translation.zh: 看看它上面那一层诱人的红色糖霜

translation.en: No, no, no! Look at yourselves!
translation.zh: 不行啊…你们这些吃货

translation.en: Discipline! We must...
translation.zh: 要守纪律 我们必须…

translation.en: [sighs] ...resist.
translation.zh: 克制

translation.en: Are you ready? [Groopert] Almost.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？ -差不多了

translation.en: Good. Think jolly.
translation.zh: 很好 想想开心事

translation.en: [Ozzy] And fat. [Groopert] Okay, I'm ready.
translation.zh: -还有脂肪 -妥妥的 准备好了

translation.en: All right, quick. Everybody hide!
translation.zh: 好了 快 大家藏起来

translation.en: Three, two, one, cue Santa!
translation.zh: 三、二、一 圣诞老人出场！

translation.en: That means you, Groopert.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人就是你 咕噜波

translation.en: [in monotone] Ho, ho, ho, ho. Look at this pretty house.
translation.zh: 看看这栋漂亮的房子

translation.en: I will leave presents for the people.
translation.zh: 我要送一些礼物给这家人

translation.en: Come on, it's not the school play, dude.
translation.zh: 拜托 又不是演学校话剧

translation.en: Then why do I have to wear the outfit?
translation.zh: 那我为什么必须穿戏服？

translation.en: Groopert, focus! Just get the cookie.
translation.zh: 咕噜波 专心 把饼干拿起来

translation.en: But I can see the string.
translation.zh: （送给圣诞老人） 但是我能看到机关

translation.en: Stop worrying! It'll be dark at night.
translation.zh: 你想太多了 晚上很黑的

translation.en: What if he has a flashlight?
translation.zh: 要是他有手电筒呢？

translation.en: Have you ever seen a picture of Santa with a flashlight?
translation.zh: 哪张图上画过圣诞老人打手电筒？

translation.en: -No, but I just-- -Groopert! Just pick up the cookie!
translation.zh: -没有 我只是… -咕噜波 让你拿你就拿

translation.en: Hmm. What do we have here? A delicious little cookie.
translation.zh: （送给圣诞老人） 瞧瞧这里有什么？ 一块好吃的小饼干

translation.en: Groopert!
translation.zh: 咕噜波

translation.en: Groopert?
translation.zh: 咕噜波

translation.en: [Groopert] Uh, hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿 朋友们

translation.en: Do I still get to eat the cookie?
translation.zh: 我还需要吃这块饼干吗？

translation.en: [Grinch] All right.
translation.zh: 大功告成

translation.en: So, I tinkered with our sleigh a bit.
translation.zh: 我把雪橇改造了一下

translation.en: Behold!
translation.zh: 看好了

translation.en: Look at this, Max.
translation.zh: 看看吧 麦克斯

translation.en: Now you'll be riding in style.
translation.zh: 你坐上去肯定风度翩翩

translation.en: A throne for a barking prince. How do you like that?
translation.zh: 汪星小王子的专属宝座 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: All right, Fred,
translation.zh: 来吧 弗雷德

translation.en: you are the engine of this great machine. Understood?
translation.zh: 你是这架豪华雪橇的动力 懂吗？

translation.en: -[low grunting] -Good. Now, remember, this is just a practice run.
translation.zh: 太棒了 记住 这只是一次演习

translation.en: But on this team, we practice like we play.
translation.zh: 但是对团队来说演习也很重要

translation.en: So, let's leave it all out on the snow.
translation.zh: 所以我们必须全力以赴

translation.en: Okay! All right, how about that?
translation.zh: 很好 我就知道肯定能行

translation.en: Now, let's pick up the pace and see how she handles.
translation.zh: 我们加快速度 体验一下漂移

translation.en: Hang on!
translation.zh: 抓紧了

translation.en: No, no, no. No problem! It's all under control.
translation.zh: 没…没问题 都在掌握之中

translation.en: We're doing it, Max. We are doing it!
translation.zh: 我们成功了 麦克斯 我们成功了

translation.en: We will not be...
translation.zh: 我们的步伐势不可…

translation.en: Stopped?
translation.zh: 挡？

translation.en: What happened? Fred?
translation.zh: 怎么回事 弗雷德？

translation.en: Sorry, but we don't need any more reindeer.
translation.zh: 对不起 我们有一头驯鹿就够了

translation.en: No. Go. Get. Shoo.
translation.zh: 不 快走开

translation.en: I have what I need.
translation.zh: 我用不着你们

translation.en: It's okay, Fred.
translation.zh: 没关系 弗雷德

translation.en: On our own again, Max.
translation.zh: 又只剩我们了 麦克斯

translation.en: [narrator] It was the day before Christmas and the Whos were abuzz,
translation.zh: 这是圣诞节的前一天 呼呼镇一片欢腾

translation.en: all doing the things that a Christmas Who does.
translation.zh: 大家都在尽情享受圣诞假期 （呼呼美食）

translation.en: Some were out buying presents, others just milled about.
translation.zh: 有人在挑选礼物 有人只是闲逛 行了 先生

translation.en: There you go, sir. But the whole town felt joyous
translation.zh: 但毫无疑问的是镇子里充满了欢乐

translation.en: -of that, there was no doubt. -[camera shutters clicking]
translation.zh: 但毫无疑问的是镇子里充满了欢乐 （圣诞节全家福）

translation.en: The weather was perfect, and soon snow would fall.
translation.zh: 天气很好 很快就会下雪了

translation.en: This surely would be... Everyone ready?
translation.zh: -这肯定是… -大家准备好了吗？

translation.en: ...the best Christmas of all.
translation.zh: 最完美的一个圣诞节

translation.en: Max! There you are! Check this out!
translation.zh: 麦克斯 你来了 快来看看这个

translation.en: I've been making lots of cool... Whoa! [laughs]
translation.zh: 我在造很多很酷的…

translation.en: Stuff.
translation.zh: 道具

translation.en: Ooh, more coffee! [slurps]
translation.zh: 你又准备了咖啡

translation.en: It's gonna be a big night.
translation.zh: 今天晚上我们要搞事情了

translation.en: We got all the gizmos and gazmos we need,
translation.zh: 道具已经齐全了

translation.en: but we still don't have the proper outfit.
translation.zh: 但是还没有合适的服装

translation.en: Come on, let's do a little stitching.
translation.zh: 来吧 跟我做点针线活

translation.en: There's only one thing left to do.
translation.zh: 只剩下最后一步了

translation.en: Max,
translation.zh: 麦克斯

translation.en: do you know what you are?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: You are a sturdy little fella.
translation.zh: 你是个坚强的小家伙

translation.en: And loyal.
translation.zh: 还很忠诚

translation.en: Very loyal.
translation.zh: 非常忠诚

translation.en: In fact, I think you're the best dog -a Grinch could hope for. -[whines]
translation.zh: 事实上 我觉得 你就是我理想中的完美小狗

translation.en: And that is why
translation.zh: 因此…

translation.en: I'm promoting you.
translation.zh: 我要提拔你

translation.en: Max,
translation.zh: 麦克斯

translation.en: you will guide my sleigh tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚拉雪橇的任务就交给你了

translation.en: I knew you wouldn't let me down.
translation.zh: 我就知道你不会让我失望

translation.en: [narrator] It was now Christmas Eve. There was joy in the air.
translation.zh: 平安夜已悄然降临 空气中洋溢着快乐的气息

translation.en: For in just a few hours, Santa Claus would be there.
translation.zh: 再过短短几个小时 圣诞老人就会到来

translation.en: And the gifts would be left, and the stockings all filled.
translation.zh: 他会带来礼物 把袜子装满

translation.en: And the anticipation, well, it started to build.
translation.zh: 从这一刻起 开始翘首以盼吧

translation.en: [woman] Ozzy, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 欧兹 你在干吗？

translation.en: Trying to get myself tired. [panting]
translation.zh: 试着让自己累到睡着

translation.en: All right, eight hours till Christmas morning.
translation.zh: 好了 再过8个小时就是圣诞节早晨

translation.en: That's 28,800 seconds.
translation.zh: 换算一下就是28800秒

translation.en: Okay, and sleep!
translation.zh: 好 睡觉

translation.en: Waffle One, this is Waffle Two. Are you there? Over.
translation.zh: 华夫一号 这里是华夫二号 能听到吗？结束

translation.en: [Cindy-Lou] I read you loud and clear, Waffle Two.
translation.zh: 听得很清楚 华夫二号

translation.en: [Groopert] This is Groopert, by the way. [Cindy-Lou] Yeah, I got that.
translation.zh: -对了 我是咕噜波 -这我知道

translation.en: [Groopert] Oh. I just wanted to wish you good luck with Santa Claus.
translation.zh: 祝你今晚顺利见到圣诞老人

translation.en: Thanks. Talk tomorrow.
translation.zh: 谢谢 明天再聊

translation.en: So, you got any last-minute wishes for Santa?
translation.zh: 你已经想好见到圣诞老人时 要许什么愿吗？

translation.en: Yep. I have one great big wish.
translation.zh: 是的 我有一个很大的愿望

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Because you deserve everything you want and more.
translation.zh: 你值得拥有想要的一切 甚至更多

translation.en: Thanks, Mom.
translation.zh: 谢谢 妈妈

translation.en: I want the same thing for you.
translation.zh: 我希望你的愿望也能实现

translation.en: How did I end up with such a wonderful daughter?
translation.zh: 我怎么会有你这么棒的女儿

translation.en: I don't know. Sometimes you just get lucky.
translation.zh: 我不知道 可能就是运气好吧

translation.en: Well, then I really did.
translation.zh: 那我上辈子肯定拯救了宇宙

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: I love you, Mom.
translation.zh: 我爱你 妈妈

translation.en: I love you, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 我爱你 亲爱的

translation.en: Good night. Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安 -晚安

translation.en: [narrator] The Grinch was now ready to start his big trip.
translation.zh: 格林奇已经准备好踏上 他的伟大征程了

translation.en: He stood like a captain aboard a great ship.
translation.zh: 他就像是一位船长站在他的大船上

translation.en: Yes, the time had now come to take off like a shot.
translation.zh: 时间到了 他要像子弹一样冲向呼呼镇

translation.en: Here we go, Max. Let's see what you've got!
translation.zh: 出发吧 麦克斯 让我看看你有什么本事

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Max?
translation.zh: 麦克斯？

translation.en: Max, are you okay?
translation.zh: 麦克斯 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah, Max! Attaboy! Go, boy! Go!
translation.zh: 麦克斯 好狗狗！加油 乖狗狗！

translation.en: [narrator] And down the Grinch came on his great fateful ride
translation.zh: 格林奇一路下山 开始了这场命中注定的冒险

translation.en: toward the good homes of Who-ville and the Christmas inside.
translation.zh: 他奔向呼呼人的美好家园 （圣诞快乐） 和即将到来的圣诞节

translation.en: He had planned it and prepped it, big detail to small.
translation.zh: 无数次的计划和演习 都是为了万无一失

translation.en: Yes, he'd get rid of Christmas now, once and for all.
translation.zh: 对 他已下定决心 要让圣诞节永远消失

translation.en: You take the outside, I'll take the inside.
translation.zh: 我去里面偷 你在外面接应

translation.en: House number one.
translation.zh: 第一栋房子

translation.en: [narrator] He was ready to pounce, and set the score right.
translation.zh: 他要发起突袭 还要彻底胜利

translation.en: He'd make up for the past, and he'd do it tonight.
translation.zh: 他要弥补过去 这就是今晚的目的

translation.en: Okay. Now let's steal Christmas.
translation.zh: 开始吧 我要偷走你们的圣诞节

translation.en: [narrator] He swept up their presents with the speed of a wiz.
translation.zh: 他以惊人的速度带走了所有礼物

translation.en: And he knew he'd cause sadness, only theirs now, not his.
translation.zh: 他知道人们会很悲伤 但是别人的悲伤 跟他没有关系

translation.en: All this excess and nonsense it was all about greed.
translation.zh: 只有贪婪的人类才会这样奢侈而无聊

translation.en: About meaningless stuff that they didn't even need.
translation.zh: 他们根本不需要这些没用的东西

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: The Grinch went to work. He scooped up the toys.
translation.zh: 格林奇大展身手 一个玩具都没落下

translation.en: He raced against time,
translation.zh: 他争分夺秒 抵挡诱惑

translation.en: he raced against joy.
translation.zh: 他争分夺秒 抵挡诱惑 （送给圣诞老人）

translation.en: He hit a few snags as he made his way through...
translation.zh: 他在行动中也遇到了一些阻碍

translation.en: -[yowling] -...an angry orange cat
translation.zh: 一只愤怒的橙色的猫

translation.en: and a sleepwalking Who.
translation.zh: 一位梦游的呼呼人

translation.en: Thank you, Mommy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 妈妈

translation.en: [narrator] He stole pop guns and bicycles, roller skates, drums,
translation.zh: 他偷走了水枪和自行车、旱冰鞋、鼓

translation.en: checker boards, tricycles, popcorn and plums.
translation.zh: 跳棋盘、三轮车 爆米花和梅子

translation.en: Gadgets and gizmos and dolls with strange names,
translation.zh: 各种各样小摆件和名字很怪的洋娃娃

translation.en: goofballs and shloof-balls and video games.
translation.zh: 五彩缤纷的玩具球和电子游戏

translation.en: And he swiped, and he poached. Yes, the stealing was on.
translation.zh: 他横扫一切不曾停歇 偷窃仍然继续

translation.en: And this day that he hated, well, he made it be gone.
translation.zh: 他恨之入骨的圣诞节 再也不会到来

translation.en: This is it. The last house.
translation.zh: 就在眼前了 最后一栋房子

translation.en: [singing] ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-dog open sleigh ♪
translation.zh: 冲破大风雪 我坐在雪橇上

translation.en: ♪ One more house to go And Christmas goes away ♪
translation.zh: 偷完这一家 圣诞就拜拜

translation.en: Oh, what the heck.
translation.zh: 真是受不了

translation.en: -Huh? [yelping] -[bells clinking]
translation.zh: （欢迎圣诞老人！）

translation.en: He's here!
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: What the...
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: How do I get out of this?
translation.zh: 怎么才能松开？

translation.en: Santa Claus.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人

translation.en: Oh. Hello. A little help, please.
translation.zh: 你好 能不能请你帮我一下？

translation.en: I'll let you down, just give me a minute.
translation.zh: 我放你下来 不要着急

translation.en: Oh, that'd be great.
translation.zh: 那太好了

translation.en: I'm coming. Just trying to remember which cord it is.
translation.zh: 我来了 我得好好想想是哪根绳子

translation.en: -[groaning] -Oh, no!
translation.zh: 糟了！

translation.en: I'm so sorry, are you okay?
translation.zh: 真对不起 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah. I guess so.
translation.zh: 好像没什么事

translation.en: -Let me help you. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 我扶你起来

translation.en: Sit down here.
translation.zh: 请坐下吧

translation.en: Drink this.
translation.zh: 喝杯牛奶

translation.en: It'll make you feel better.
translation.zh: 这会让你舒服一点

translation.en: Uh... Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Wow. I can't believe it's really you!
translation.zh: 我不敢相信真的是你

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I'm so sorry about the trap and everything, but I really need...
translation.zh: 很抱歉我给你设了个陷阱 但我真的有事…

translation.en: Hey! Why are you taking our Christmas tree?
translation.zh: 你为什么要拿走我们的圣诞树？

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 这个嘛

translation.en: One of the lights wasn't working,
translation.zh: 有一个彩灯不亮了

translation.en: so I thought I'd take it back to the workshop
translation.zh: 我想把它带回我的工作室

translation.en: and see if I could fix it.
translation.zh: 看看能不能修好

translation.en: I didn't know you did that.
translation.zh: 你还会帮忙修东西吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
translation.zh: 当然会了

translation.en: Now, why don't you go back upstairs to bed,
translation.zh: 你还是赶快上楼睡觉吧

translation.en: and then when you wake up the tree will be fixed and your presents will be waiting under it.
translation.zh: 等你醒来 树就回来了 礼物也会在树下等你

translation.en: Wait. You don't understand, I don't want presents.
translation.zh: 等等 你不明白 我不想要礼物

translation.en: [chuckles] Of course you do. Everyone wants presents.
translation.zh: 你当然想要了 人人都想要礼物

translation.en: No, no, really, I don't! I want you to help my mom.
translation.zh: 不…真的不要 我想让你帮帮我妈妈

translation.en: Your mom?
translation.zh: 你妈妈？

translation.en: Yeah. She works so hard
translation.zh: 对 她工作那么努力

translation.en: and is always doing stuff for other people,
translation.zh: 还总是乐于助人

translation.en: and I just want her to be happy.
translation.zh: 我只是希望她快乐

translation.en: You want me to help your mom?
translation.zh: 你想让我帮助你妈妈？

translation.en: You're Santa.
translation.zh: 你是圣诞老人

translation.en: You make people happy.
translation.zh: 你给人们带来快乐

translation.en: And everyone should be happy, right?
translation.zh: 人人都应该快乐 对吧？

translation.en: [stammers] Yeah...
translation.zh: 对 我…

translation.en: I guess they should.
translation.zh: 人们确实应该快乐

translation.en: Santa, are you okay?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 你还好吧？

translation.en: What? Uh...
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Yeah. I'm fine. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对 我很好

translation.en: Now, why don't you go back up to bed, hmm?
translation.zh: 你还是回去睡觉吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I wish you could celebrate with us tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我希望明天你能和我们一起庆祝

translation.en: We all get together and sing.
translation.zh: 我们会一起唱歌

translation.en: It's so beautiful that if you close your eyes and listen,
translation.zh: 那些歌特别美 如果你闭上眼聆听

translation.en: all of your sadness just goes away.
translation.zh: 所有的悲伤都会消失不见

translation.en: That sounds nice.
translation.zh: 听上去不错

translation.en: Thank you, Santa.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 圣诞老人

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: Good... Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: I just met the strangest little Who girl.
translation.zh: 我刚刚遇到了 呼呼镇里最奇怪的小女孩

translation.en: All right, Max. Let's go.
translation.zh: 算了 麦克斯 我们走吧

translation.en: [narrator] He tried to forget it, but the words filled his head
translation.zh: 他试图忘记 但怎么都忘不掉

translation.en: and he found himself thinking about what the young girl had said.
translation.zh: 他发现自己一直在想小女孩说的话

translation.en: It was hard to imagine. Could it really be true?
translation.zh: 那些话难以想象 怎么可能是真的？

translation.en: But if they could all be happy, maybe he could be, too.
translation.zh: 如果人们都能快乐 也许他也能快乐

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [narrator] Her head felt unsteady, and her heart was just sick.
translation.zh: 她感到一阵眩晕 心跳几乎要停止

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: It must be a joke or a prank, or a trick.
translation.zh: 这一定是个玩笑 恶作剧或者小伎俩

translation.en: Who would do such a thing?
translation.zh: 谁能做出这样的事？

translation.en: Who would stoop down this low?
translation.zh: 谁会如此卑劣？

translation.en: And then one little girl realized she might just know.
translation.zh: 这时一个小女孩突然想到 她可能知道答案

translation.en: 3,000 feet up, up the side of Mount Crumpit,
translation.zh: 在914米高的克兰皮特山山脊上

translation.en: the Grinch rode with his load to the tip-top to dump it.
translation.zh: 格林奇负重前行 要到山顶把礼物丢掉

translation.en: Keep going.
translation.zh: 继续往前

translation.en: We're gonna make it.
translation.zh: 我们快要到了

translation.en: [Izzy] Oh, dear. What... What happened?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 发生什么事了？

translation.en: Where's the decorations?
translation.zh: 装饰都去哪了？

translation.en: All the presents. Aw, man!
translation.zh: -礼物也不见了 -天啊

translation.en: Mom, it's my fault.
translation.zh: 妈妈 都是我的错

translation.en: What... What is?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: All of this.
translation.zh: 这事都怪我

translation.en: I trapped Santa last night
translation.zh: 我昨晚给圣诞老人设了个陷阱

translation.en: because I wanted to ask him to do something special for you.
translation.zh: 因为我想求他帮帮你

translation.en: But I think I made him mad
translation.zh: 他一定是被我气坏了

translation.en: and that's why he stole everyone's Christmas.
translation.zh: 所以把圣诞节给偷走了

translation.en: No! No, no. No, honey, this isn't your fault.
translation.zh: 不…亲爱的 这不是你的错

translation.en: He didn't steal Christmas, he just stole stuff.
translation.zh: 他没有偷走圣诞节 他只是偷走了东西

translation.en: Christmas is in here.
translation.zh: 圣诞节在我们心里

translation.en: And besides, I already have the greatest gift I could ever get.
translation.zh: 况且我已经得到了最想要的礼物

translation.en: You.
translation.zh: 是你啊

translation.en: Just one more shove.
translation.zh: 就差一点点了

translation.en: What's that? Do you hear it?
translation.zh: 什么声音？你听到了吗？

translation.en: [all singing] ♪ Dahoo dores ♪
translation.zh: 什么声音？你听到了吗？ …达乎多利丝

translation.en: ♪ Welcome Christmas Christmas Day ♪
translation.zh: …达乎多利丝 欢迎 圣诞 圣诞节

translation.en: ♪ Welcome, welcome... ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎…

translation.en: They're singing?
translation.zh: 他们在唱歌？

translation.en: ♪ Welcome, welcome Fahoo ramus ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎…

translation.en: I don't understand, Max.
translation.zh: 我不明白 麦克斯

translation.en: ♪ Christmas Day Is in our grasp ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞节永远不会离开我们

translation.en: Don't they know what I've done?
translation.zh: 难道他们不知道我做了什么吗？

translation.en: ♪ So long as we have Hands to clasp ♪
translation.zh: 只要我们的手紧紧相扣

translation.en: ♪ Fahoo fores dahoo dores ♪
translation.zh: 法乎佛里斯 达乎多利丝

translation.en: ♪ Welcome home ♪ ♪ Welcome home ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎回家…

translation.en: ♪ Welcome home ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎回家

translation.en: [narrator] As he watched the small girl, he thought he might melt.
translation.zh: 他看着那个小女孩 感觉全身暖洋洋的

translation.en: If he did what she did, would he feel what she felt?
translation.zh: 如果他也闭上双眼 能和她一样快乐吗？

translation.en: And the luscious sound swelled, reaching up to the skies.
translation.zh: 美妙的歌声越发响亮 传遍整个天际

translation.en: And the Grinch heard with his heart, and it tripled in size.
translation.zh: 格林奇用心聆听 他的心变大了两倍

translation.en: What? Oh, no!
translation.zh: 什么？不好了！

translation.en: No! No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不要…

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 糟了！

translation.en: No, don't worry. I got it.
translation.zh: 不用担心 我能搞定

translation.en: Max, it's okay. I'm...
translation.zh: 别急 麦克斯 我…

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 完了…

translation.en: Max!
translation.zh: 麦克斯！

translation.en: Fred?
translation.zh: 弗雷德？

translation.en: You...
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: You came back.
translation.zh: 你回来了

translation.en: -Max, the gifts! We have to return them. -[barks]
translation.zh: 麦克斯 我们必须把礼物还回去

translation.en: [narrator] And having heard the Whos' goodness, having felt the Whos' song,
translation.zh: 感受到了呼呼人的善意 被呼呼人的歌声所感动

translation.en: he tried to make right what he had made wrong.
translation.zh: 他幡然醒悟 决定改正自己的错误

translation.en: [all singing] ♪ Welcome home ♪ ♪ Welcome home ♪ -[trumpet playing] -[all murmuring]
translation.zh: 欢迎回家…

translation.en: Hello, everybody.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: It was me.
translation.zh: 是我干的

translation.en: I stole your Christmas.
translation.zh: 我偷走了你们的圣诞节

translation.en: I stole it because...
translation.zh: 我这么做是因为…

translation.en: Because I thought it would fix something that happened a long time ago.
translation.zh: 因为我以为这样就能弥补 很久以前发生的一件事

translation.en: But it didn't,
translation.zh: 但是我错了

translation.en: and I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I'm so very sorry.
translation.zh: 我为我做的一切

translation.en: For everything.
translation.zh: 感到非常抱歉

translation.en: Not now, Max.
translation.zh: 我没心情 麦克斯

translation.en: I need to be alone.
translation.zh: 我想一个人静静

translation.en: [stammers] I kind of thought you might like it.
translation.zh: 我还以为你会喜欢

translation.en: You don't like it? Oh, I could take it back.
translation.zh: 你不喜欢吗？我还是拿回来吧

translation.en: It's not a big deal. -I just thought maybe you... -[barking]
translation.zh: 没什么大不了 也许你更喜欢别的…

translation.en: Oh, hey. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you, too, Max.
translation.zh: 我也祝你圣诞快乐 麦克斯

translation.en: [sighs] That's gonna get old.
translation.zh: 会被你玩坏的

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 有人敲门

translation.en: Uh, hello.
translation.zh: （此路不通！） 你好

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Remember me?
translation.zh: 记得我吗？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I do. I remember you.
translation.zh: 是的…我当然记得你

translation.en: My name is Cindy-Lou. Cindy-Lou Who.
translation.zh: 我的名字叫辛迪露 辛迪露呼

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, Cindy-Lou.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 辛迪露

translation.en: -Oh, my name is Grinch. -[toy squeaking]
translation.zh: 我的名字叫格林奇

translation.en: And, uh, this is Max.
translation.zh: 这是麦克斯

translation.en: [chuckles] Whoa! Nice to meet you, Max.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 麦克斯

translation.en: I just came to invite you to our house for Christmas dinner.
translation.zh: 我是来邀请你 去我们家参加圣诞晚宴的

translation.en: What? Me?
translation.zh: 什么？我吗？

translation.en: But I took your gifts.
translation.zh: 可是我偷走了你们的礼物

translation.en: Yeah, I know. And your trees.
translation.zh: -我知道 -还有你们的圣诞树

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I stole your whole Christmas.
translation.zh: 我偷走了整个圣诞节

translation.en: I know you did. But we're inviting you anyway.
translation.zh: 我知道是你干的 但我们还是要邀请你

translation.en: But why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Because you've been alone long enough.
translation.zh: 因为…你已经孤单得够久了

translation.en: Dinner's at 6:00!
translation.zh: 晚宴6点钟开始

translation.en: Don't be late.
translation.zh: 别迟到

translation.en: And make sure you bring your sweet doggy, too!
translation.zh: 记得带上你那可爱的狗狗

translation.en: Right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 别怂

translation.en: Um, this is a bad idea. [stammers] I can't do this. I can't do this.
translation.zh: 这主意糟透了 我不该来的…

translation.en: They're all gonna hate me.
translation.zh: 他们肯定恨死我了

translation.en: All right. [grunts]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I did it.
translation.zh: 我按了

translation.en: Oh, Mr. Grinch.
translation.zh: 哦 格林奇先生

translation.en: I'm so happy you decided to come. Welcome!
translation.zh: 你能来我真是太开心了 欢迎

translation.en: Thank you for inviting me.
translation.zh: 感谢您邀请我

translation.en: Uh, I wore a tie.
translation.zh: 我打了条领带

translation.en: And it's a very nice tie.
translation.zh: 这条领带非常漂亮

translation.en: Cindy-Lou, look who came!
translation.zh: 辛迪露 看看谁来了

translation.en: Mr. Grinch! You're here!
translation.zh: 格林奇先生 你来了

translation.en: Hello!
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Come on in, I'll show you around.
translation.zh: 请进 我给你介绍一下

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Hello, Mr. Grinch. Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 你好 格林奇先生 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you, too.
translation.zh: 也祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: Aunt Ida, I'd like you to meet my friend, the Grinch.
translation.zh: 艾达姨妈 我来给你介绍 我朋友格林奇

translation.en: Oh, it's nice to meet you, Mr. Grinch.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 格林奇先生

translation.en: Thank you. It's nice to be here.
translation.zh: 谢谢 很高兴能来参加晚宴

translation.en: Oh, here, let me take that for you.
translation.zh: 给我吧 我来帮你拿

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Cindy-Lou, could you make a little room for this, please?
translation.zh: 辛迪露 去把桌子收拾一下好…

translation.en: No, don't worry. I've got it.
translation.zh: 别担心 我来吧

translation.en: Oh, isn't that thoughtful?
translation.zh: 他真是太周到了

translation.en: Is that grouchy, grumpy Grinchy I see standing over there?
translation.zh: 真的是格林奇老朋友吗？ 不是我眼花了吧

translation.en: -[laughs] -Bricklebaum, good to see you.
translation.zh: 棒叔叔 你也在这里啊

translation.en: -Come on, Grinchy, give me a hug. -Oh! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 格林奇 来拥抱一下

translation.en: It don't count if you don't hug back, buddy.
translation.zh: 朋友 你不抱我就不算是拥抱了

translation.en: Okay, come take your seats, everyone. Dinner's ready.
translation.zh: 大家就座吧 晚餐准备好了

translation.en: Come on, you're sitting next to me.
translation.zh: 来 你坐在我旁边

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: 坐吧

translation.en: This is my first Christmas dinner. What happens?
translation.zh: 这是我第一次参加圣诞晚宴 -我该怎么做？ -不用紧张

translation.en: You'll see.
translation.zh: -我该怎么做？ -不用紧张

translation.en: Would you do the honors, Mr. Grinch?
translation.zh: 格林奇先生 您愿意切第一道菜吗？

translation.en: Uh, okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Do you mind if I say something first?
translation.zh: 您不介意我先跟大家说几句话吧？

translation.en: Not at all.
translation.zh: 不介意

translation.en: Um, well, everybody, I just want to say,
translation.zh: 各位 我只想说…

translation.en: I've spent my entire life
translation.zh: 我曾经花了一辈子

translation.en: hating Christmas and everything about it.
translation.zh: 去憎恨圣诞节和与之相关的一切

translation.en: But now I see that it wasn't Christmas I hated,
translation.zh: 现在我明白了 我憎恨的不是圣诞节

translation.en: it was being alone.
translation.zh: 而是孤独

translation.en: But I'm not alone anymore.
translation.zh: 但我已经不再孤独了

translation.en: And I have all of you to thank for it.
translation.zh: 这都是托了你们大家的福

translation.en: But especially
translation.zh: 尤其是…

translation.en: this little girl right here.
translation.zh: 我旁边的这位小姑娘

translation.en: Ma'am,
translation.zh: 夫人

translation.en: your daughter's kindness changed my life.
translation.zh: 您女儿的善良 改变了我的人生

translation.en: That's my girl.
translation.zh: 我为她骄傲

translation.en: Oh, that was beautiful.
translation.zh: 真是太感人了

translation.en: That's my best friend.
translation.zh: 他是我最好的朋友

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Mr. Grinch.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 格林奇先生

translation.en: -Merry Christmas, Cindy-Lou. -[barks]
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 辛迪露

translation.en: [narrator] And the Grinch raised his glass,
translation.zh: 格林奇举起酒杯

translation.en: and led the Whos in a toast.
translation.zh: 向在座的人们敬酒

translation.en: To kindness and love, the things we need most.
translation.zh: 为善良与爱干杯 它们才是我们最需要的东西
